languages.text: "Делать свой ход. Чего вы желаете — отвергнуть дар, показательно игнорируя происходящее, или же принять его на своих условиях? Согласно этикету нобилите, ответный дар должен быть равноценным по вложенным усилиям и эмоциям. И обязательно передан через третье лицо — как и сам имморталиум".

traits.locale_text: "Делать свой ход. Чего вы желаете — отвергнуть дар, показательно игнорируя происходящее, или же принять его на своих условиях? Согласно этикету нобилите, ответный дар должен быть равноценным по вложенным усилиям и эмоциям. И обязательно передан через третье лицо — как и сам имморталиум".

languages.text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."
languages.original_text: "Делать свой ход. Чего вы желаете — отвергнуть дар, показательно игнорируя происходящее, или же принять его на своих условиях? Согласно этикету нобилите, ответный дар должен быть равноценным по вложенным усилиям и эмоциям. И обязательно передан через третье лицо — как и сам имморталиум".

traits.locale_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or to accept it on your own terms? According to the decorum of the Nobilite, the reciprocal gift must be equal in effort and display just as much emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the Immortalium itself."

"Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or to accept it on your own terms? According to the decorum of the Nobilite, the reciprocal gift must be equal in effort and display just as much emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the Immortalium itself."

"Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to the decorum of the Nobilite, the reciprocal gift must be made in equal effort and display just as much emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the Immortalium itself."

"Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to the decorum of the Nobilite, the reciprocal gift must be made in equal effort and display just as much emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the Immortalium itself."

"Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

"Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

languages.text: "Ihr seid am Zug. Möchtet Ihr das Geschenk ablehnen, die Geste demonstrativ ignorieren oder sie nach Euren eigenen Bedingungen annehmen? Die Etikette des Adels verlangt, dass das Gegengeschenk ebenso aufwendig sein und ebenso viel Gefühl vermitteln muss. Und es muss durch eine dritte Partei übergeben werden, genau wie das Immortalium selbst."
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid am Zug. Möchtet Ihr das Geschenk ablehnen, die Geste demonstrativ ignorieren oder sie nach Euren eigenen Bedingungen annehmen? Die Etikette in der Nobilite verlangt, dass das Gegengeschenk ebenso aufwendig sein und ebenso viel Gefühl vermitteln muss. Und es muss durch eine dritte Partei übergeben werden, genau wie das Immortalium selbst."

languages.text: « C'est à vous d'en décider. Allez-vous refuser ce cadeau, l'ignorer ouvertement ou bien l'accepter selon vos propres conditions ? Si l'on s'en tient aux usages en vigueur dans l'aristocratie, vous devez faire en retour un cadeau réciproque, d'effort équivalent et montrant le même degré d'émotion. Ce cadeau devra être transmis par une tierce partie, tout comme l'immortalium. »
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à vous d'en décider. Allez-vous refuser ce cadeau, l'ignorer ouvertement ou bien l'accepter selon vos propres conditions ? Si l'on s'en tient au décorum de la Navis Nobilite, vous devez faire en retour un cadeau réciproque, d'effort équivalent et montrant le même degré d'émotion. Ce cadeau devra être transmis par une tierce partie, tout comme l'immortalium. »

languages.text: “做出行动即可，大人。您是想拒绝这份礼物吗？还是想摆出一副视而不见的姿态？或是按照您的方式来接受它？根据贵族的礼仪，您的回礼必须同样努力，表现出同样的情感，而且必须通过第三方进行交付，正如永生花本身一样。”
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: “做出行动即可，大人。您是想拒绝这份礼物吗？还是想摆出一副视而不见的姿态？或是按照您的方式来接受它？根据贵族的礼仪，您的回礼必须同样努力，表现出同样的情感，而且必须通过第三方进行交付，正如永生花本身一样。”

languages.text: 「ご決断を。贈り物を拒否し、これ見よがしにメッセージを無視されるのか、思いのまま受け取られるのか？貴族の礼節によれば、返礼品は同等の努力と情緒を兼ね備えていなければなりません。そしてそのイモータリウムのように、第三者を通じて届けねばならないのです」
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: 「ご決断を。贈り物を拒否し、これ見よがしにジェスチャーを無視されるのか、お好きなように受け取られるのか？貴族の礼節によれば、返礼品は同等の労力と情緒を以てなされなければなりません。そしてそのイモータリムそのもののように、第三者を通じて届けねばならないのです」

languages.text: «Mueva ficha. ¿Desea rechazar el regalo, ignorando ostentosamente el gesto, o aceptarlo según sus propios términos? Según las normas de etiqueta de la nobleza, el regalo de vuelta debe demostrar igual esfuerzo y misma emoción. Y debe entregarse a través de un tercero, al igual que el inmortalium».
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: «Mueva ficha. ¿Desea rechazar el regalo, ignorando ostentosamente el gesto, o aceptarlo según sus propios términos? Según las normas de decoro de la Nobilite, el regalo de vuelta debe hacerse con igual esfuerzo y representar la misma emoción. Y debe entregarse a través de un tercero, al igual que el inmortalium».

languages.text: "Hamle sırası sizde. Caka satarak jesti görmezden gelmek suretiyle hediyeyi reddetmek mi yoksa kendi ifadenizle kabul etmek mi istiyorsunuz? Adabımuaşerete göre mütekabil bir hediye; eşit derecede çaba ve duygu içermeli, ayrıca immortalium örneğindeki gibi üçüncü bir taraf aracılığıyla teslim edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "Make your move. Do you wish to reject the gift, ostentatiously ignoring the gesture, or accept it on your own terms? According to noble etiquette, the reciprocal gift must display equal effort and emotion. And it must be delivered through a third party, just like the immortalium itself."

traits.locale_text: "Hamle sırası sizde. Caka satarak jesti görmezden gelmek suretiyle hediyeyi reddetmek mi yoksa kendi ifadenizle kabul etmek mi istiyorsunuz? Adabımuaşerete göre mütekabil bir hediye; eşit derecede çaba ve duygu içermeli, ayrıca immortalium örneğindeki gibi üçüncü bir taraf aracılığıyla teslim edilmelidir."
